lead_paragraph: William Crain admitted to refusing to return to an area set up for protesters in Fredon, N.J. A judge assigned him to 10 days in jail.
snippet: William Crain admitted to refusing to return to an area set up for protesters in Fredon, N.J. A judge assigned him to 10 days in jail....

headline.main: City College Professor Is Sentenced to Jail Over Bear Hunt Protest
headline.print_headline: Professor Gets Jail for Bear Hunt Protest
